column1: '''David Doughan MBE''' is a prolific writer, editor and member of [[The Tolkien Society]]. He has edited the Society's journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)
column2: Mallorn]]'' as well as its linguistic bulletin ''[[Quettar]]''.
